snippet.title: Altheia: The Wrath of Aferi - Reveal Trailer | TGS 2023
snippet.description:
Take a first look at Altheia: The Wrath of Aferi, a cute adventure game in which you work with an arcane monk to save your home from the Void. There's ruined temples to explore, puzzles to solve, spirits to rescue, and giant monsters to defeat.

#IGN #Gaming #Altheia
